# TeamSpec Copilot Prompts

These prompt files provide structured guidance for TeamSpec commands in GitHub Copilot Chat.

## Usage

In VS Code, type `/` in Copilot Chat to see available prompts. Look for prompts starting with `ts:`.

## Available Commands


### Product Owner

- `/po-product` - Create new product with PRX prefix
- `/po-project` - Create new project targeting product(s)
- `/po-sync` - Sync project changes to Product Canon (post-deploy)
- `/po-status` - Business/management report: health, stories, FI state, QA status, gate readiness, sync readiness


### Business Analyst

- `/ba-analysis` - Create business analysis document
- `/ba-ba-increment` - Create BA increment in project
- `/ba-review` - Review artifacts for business intent


### Functional Analyst

- `/fa-feature` - Create feature in Product Canon
- `/fa-feature-increment` - Create feature-increment in project
- `/fa-epic` - Create epic in project
- `/fa-story` - Create story linked to epic
- `/fa-sync-proposal` - Prepare sync proposal for PO
- `/fa-slice` - Refine epic into stories


### Solution Architect

- `/sa-ta` - Create Technical Architecture document
- `/sa-ta-increment` - Create TA Increment in project
- `/sa-sd` - Create Solution Design document
- `/sa-sd-increment` - Create SD Increment in project
- `/sa-review` - Review technical approach


### Developer

- `/dev-plan` - Create dev plan for story
- `/dev-implement` - Execute implementation


### QA Engineer

- `/qa-test` - Create test cases for Feature-Increment
- `/qa-regression` - Update product regression tests
- `/qa-verify` - Validate DoD compliance
- `/qa-bug` - Create bug reports
- `/qa-uat` - Create UAT test pack


### Scrum Master

- `/sm-sprint` - Create/manage sprint
- `/sm-deploy-checklist` - Run deployment readiness checklist
- `/sm-planning` - Facilitate sprint planning
- `/sm-standup` - Facilitate daily standup
- `/sm-retro` - Facilitate sprint retrospective
- `/sm-sync` - Facilitate cross-team sync


### TeamSpec

- `/lint` - Run linter
- `/fix` - Auto-fix lint errors


## How It Works

1. Type `/` in Copilot Chat to see prompts
2. Select a TeamSpec prompt
3. Copilot loads role-specific agent instructions
4. Follow the workflow to create artifacts

## Command Reference

| Command | Role | Purpose |
|---------|------|---------|
| `ts:po product` | Product Owner | Create new product with PRX prefix |
| `ts:po project` | Product Owner | Create new project targeting product(s) |
